person.persName: Z. Westley Bugg (Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney. Sumner County, Tennessee, native. Son of Richard F. Bugg and Prudence M. Chappell Bugg. Married to Mary A. Jackson Bugg. Father of Lucy P. Bugg, and Richard Bugg. Relocated with family to Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1839. Teacher in the Christian County, Kentucky, common schools. Read law under Judge Charles S. Marshall in Ballard County. Admitted to the bar in 1856 and pursued his legal practice in Ballard County. Attorney in Ballard County in 1860. Secretary of the Masonic Order of Kentucky at Blandville Lodge, No. 142, in 1860.
